## Poverty

```{r}
library(RSQLite)
poverty = 
  data_enaho %>%
  left_join(data_maternal_prov, by = c("year","NOMBDEP","NOMBPROV")) %>%
  left_join(data_congenital_prov, by = c("year","NOMBDEP","NOMBPROV")) %>%
  select(poverty,year,NOMBDEP,NOMBPROV,conglome,estrato,facpob07,rate_mat,rate_con) %>%
  filter(!is.na(poverty))%>%
  filter(year > "2014") %>%
  mutate(
    NOMBPROV = as.factor(NOMBPROV),
    year = as.factor(year),
    poverty = as.factor(poverty)
  ) %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  nest() %>%
  mutate(
    df = map(.x=data,
             .f = ~svydesign(id = ~ conglome, strata = ~ estrato, weights = ~ facpob07, data = .x))
  )

options(survey.lonely.psu="remove")
```

Poverty objective 2
```{r}
poverty_mr = 
  poverty %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  mutate(
    wi = map(.x = df,
              .f = ~svyby(~poverty, by =~rate_mat , design = .x, FUN =svymean) %>% 
                as.data.frame())
  ) %>%
  unnest(wi) 
options(survey.lonely.psu="remove")

poverty_mr = poverty_mr %>%  
  mutate(
    poverty = ifelse(povertyno_poor > povertypoor, "No poor", ifelse(povertypoor > povertyno_poor, "Poor", NA ))) %>%
  filter(!is.na(poverty))%>%
  group_by(year,poverty)%>%
  summarize(rate_mat_mean=mean(rate_mat))

poverty_mr %>% 
     DT::datatable()
``` 

```{r}
poverty_mrg =
  ggplot(data = poverty_mr,aes(x = year, y = rate_mat_mean, group = poverty))+
  geom_line(size = 1.2, aes(col = poverty))+
  xlab("Years") +
  ylab("Prop. %") +
  theme_bw() +
  theme(
    axis.title = element_text(face ="bold", size = 11),
    legend.text = element_text(size = 8, face = "bold"),
    axis.text = element_text(face = "bold", family = "Arial"),
    axis.text.x = element_text( size = 9),
    legend.position = "top",
    legend.title = element_blank(),
    axis.line = element_line(colour = "black", size = 1),
    panel.background = element_blank(),
    strip.background = element_blank(),
    strip.text = element_text(face = "bold"),
    panel.grid = element_blank()
  )

poverty_mrg 
#ggsave("dep_wealth_obj2.png", plot = poverty_mrg, width = 8, height = 4, dpi = 300)
```

## Poverty base AMAZONAS
```{r}
dep_poverty = 
  data_enaho %>%
  left_join(data_maternal_prov, by = c("year","NOMBDEP","NOMBPROV")) %>%
  left_join(data_congenital_prov, by = c("year","NOMBDEP","NOMBPROV")) %>%
  select(poverty,year,NOMBDEP,NOMBPROV,conglome,estrato,facpob07,rate_mat,rate_con) %>%
  filter(!is.na(poverty))%>%
  filter(year > "2014") %>%
  filter(NOMBDEP== "AMAZONAS") %>%
  mutate(
    NOMBPROV = as.factor(NOMBPROV),
    year = as.factor(year),
    poverty = as.factor(poverty)
  ) %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  nest() %>%
  mutate(
    df = map(.x=data,
             .f = ~svydesign(id = ~ conglome, strata = ~ estrato, weights = ~ facpob07, data = .x))
  )

options(survey.lonely.psu="remove")
```
